pages.text: Ke kaloku abo bafika emva kwabo bathi: “Nkosi yethu! Sixolele thina nabazalwana bethu abasandulelayo elukholweni, ungafaki nzondo ezintliziyweni zethu ngokuchasene nabo bakholiweyo. Nkosi yethu inene Wena unguSobubele, uSozinceba

Akubabonanga na abahanahanisi, abathi koogxa babo abangabanye baBantu beNcwadi abangakholwayo: “Sifunga ngoAllâh ukuba nigxothiwe nina, nathi oku kwethu siya kuhamba nani, kwaye ukuba niyahlaselwa, inene siya kunincedisa thina.” Kodwa uAllâh liNgqina Yena lokuba bona ngamaxoki okwenene

Inene, ukuba wona (amaYuda) agxothiwe, asokuze bona (abahanahanisi) bahambe nawo, kanti ke nokuba bangawancedisa (amaYuda lawo), (abahanahanisi) baza kuphinda beze ngomva (babaleke) yaye abayi kuba noloyiso
Inene, nina (bakholwayo) noyikeka kakhulu ezintliziyweni zawo (amaYuda) kunoAllah, oko kungenxa yokuba bangabantu abangenangqiqo

Abasokuze balwe nani ngaphandle kokuba kungaphakathi kwezixeko ezikhuselekileyo okanye ngaphaya kweendonga. Ukruthakruthano phakathi kwabo luninzi. Nina nicinga ukuba bamanyene kodwa iintliziyo zabo zahlukene. Oko kunjalo ngenxa yukuba bangabantu abangaqiqiyo
Imfano yabo inje ngabo babengaphambi kwabo kwithuba elisandula kugqitha: bona ke bangcamla iziphumo zezenzo zabo, yaye basaza kufumana isohlwayo esibuhlungu

(Abahanahanisi) banjengoShaytân xa esithi emntwini, “Mus’ukukholwa.” Aze athi (umntu lowo) esakungakholwa, (uShaytân athi): “Inene, mna ndiyazikhwebula kuwe. Inene mna ndoyika uAllâh, iNkosi yamaphakade.”
